articles.title: India orders antitrust probe against Amazon, Walmart's Flipkart
articles.description: India's antitrust body has ordered an investigation into alleged competition law violations by Amazon.com Inc and Walmart's Flipkart, it said in an order on Monday.

NEW DELHI (Reuters) - India’s antitrust body has ordered an investigation into alleged competition law violations by Amazon.com Inc and Walmart’s Flipkart, it said in an order on Monday.

articles.title: Veru's experimental drug reduces hot flashes in men in mid-stage study
articles.description: Veru Inc said on Monday a higher dose of its experimental drug reduced hot flashes in men with advanced prostate cancer after six weeks of treatment, in a mid-stage study.
articles.content:
(Reuters) - Veru Inc said on Monday a higher dose of its experimental drug reduced hot flashes in men with advanced prostate cancer after six weeks of treatment, in a mid-stage study.

articles.title: Expert Views: India's December retail inflation accelerates to 7.35%
articles.description: India's retail inflation accelerated to 7.35% in December due to high food prices, government data showed on Monday.
articles.content:
BENGALURU/MUMBAI (Reuters) - India’s retail inflation accelerated to 7.35% in December due to high food prices, government data showed on Monday. 
December inflation was higher than 6.20% forecast in a Reuters poll of analysts.
